entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
